snippet.title: Best Audio Recorder for YouTube Videos: Zoom H1 Recorder
snippet.description:
In this video, I'll quickly talk about the best way to capture audio into your videos using a Zoom H1 Recorder device.  We'll also compare this with what the Blue Yeti sounds like.  

In addition to this, I'll do a little demonstration of how recording directly into the Zoom H1 microphone works.  It is surprisingly good, I would argue even better than the lapel and in some respects better than the Blue Yeti.

Zoom H1 Recorder: http://amzn.to/2lAXimU
Sony Mic: http://amzn.to/2mgLUdd
Sony Clip On Mic: https://goo.gl/eV7SES

Blue Yeti: http://amzn.to/2mgV2hO
Rode Boom Microphone Arm: http://amzn.to/2kGtwOy
Shock Mount: http://amzn.to/2lgNFtc

iOS Basic Training Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/basic-training

Facebook Group
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1240636442694543/

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
